title: Let’s Get Hyped Up!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>How does Kasumin look today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Cute as ever!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah, cute. Rina-chan Board says, “Swoon.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehe~ I knew it!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want you to check if there’s anything off about me too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah, look at me too, please!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Sure thing! Just spin around for me, please.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Spin spin spin spin~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Spin spin spin spin~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hmm~, Setsuna-senpai and Rinako aren’t as cute as Kasumin, but you’re all still adorable! Perfect!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>We’re all set.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I can’t wait to see everyone’s faces on stage!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is going to remember everyone’s faces~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
